titleStmt.title: A declaration of her sacred Majestie of Sweden, concerning the setling of convoys about Gothemburg. Given at Stockholm the 16th of August, 1653.
titleStmt.author: Sweden. Sovereign (1632-1654 : Kristina)
Kristina, Queen of Sweden, 1626-1689.

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Dated at our Castle of Stockholm the 16. of August 1653.
